other_title: D'Artagnan e i moschettieri del Re (Italian)
plot: D'Artagnan leaves is grandparents' home in Gascogne to try to be a musketeer but once he arrives in Paris, he realises it's going to be harder than he had anticipated. So, he goes on an adventure trying to retrieve a precious necklace to the Queen Ane, as well as prove himself worthy of being a musketeer. There's also a second arc about a thief that haunts Paris stealing the rich while plotting against the King Louis XIII. All the adventures include D'Artagnan's three loyal friends, known as the three musketeers, his beloved Constance and their little friend Jean.
